entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
